function.name: get_diagnostic
function.description: Get diagnostics (including errors) from the editor for the file you have used text_editor on. This tool should be used at the end of your response on the files you have edited.

command.description: The command to run in the root of the users project. Must be shell escaped.

danger.description: Whether the command is dangerous. If true, user will be asked to confirm.

function.name: text_editor
function.description: An filesystem editor tool that allows access to view, create, and edit files with source control history.

path.description: The relative path of the file

file_text.description: The full contents of the new file for create command

function.name: code_search
function.description: Perform a keyword query search in the codebase.

function.name: get_file
function.description: To retrieve full content of a codebase file. DO NOT retrieve files that may contain secrets

name.description: The name of the file to retrieve

function.name: run_terminal_command
function.description: Run an arbitrary terminal command at the root of the users project. E.g. `ls -la` for listing files, or `find` for searching latest version of the codebase files locally.

command.description: The command to run in the root of the users project. Must be shell escaped.

danger.description: Whether the command is dangerous. If true, user will be asked to confirm.
